verses.verse: <S%G5124>This<s%> is the <S%G5154>third<s%> time I am <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>. <S%G1909>In<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2532>or<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> <S%G2476>shall<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> be <S%G2476>established<s%>.

I told you <S%G4280>before<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> foretell <S%G4302>you<s%>, as <S%G5613>if<s%> I were <S%G3918>present<s%>, the <S%G1208>second<s%> time; <S%G2532>and<s%> being <S%G548>absent<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> I <S%G1125>write<s%> to them which heretofore have <S%G4258>sinned<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3062>other<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>again<s%> <S%G3825><s%>, I <S%G5339>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5339>spare<s%>:

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1487>though<s%> he was <S%G4717>crucified<s%> <S%G1537>through<s%> <S%G769>weakness<s%>, <S%G235>yet<s%> he <S%G2198>liveth<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>. <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> are <S%G770>weak<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> we shall <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>. in him: or, with him

<S%G3985>Examine<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%>, <S%G1487>whether<s%> ye <S%G2075>be<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%>; <S%G1381>prove<s%> your own <S%G1438>selves<s%><S%G2228>.<s%> Know <S%G1921>ye<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> your own <S%G1438>selves<s%>, how <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G1509>except<s%> ye <S%G2075>be<s%> <S%G5100>reprobates<s%> <S%G96><s%>?

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G2172>pray<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> that <S%G5209>ye<s%> <S%G3361>do<s%> <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%>; <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> should <S%G5316>appear<s%> <S%G1384>approved<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> should <S%G4160>do<s%> that which is <S%G2570>honest<s%>, <S%G1161>though<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G96>reprobates<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> are <S%G5463>glad<s%>, <S%G3752>when<s%> we are <S%G770>weak<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G5600>are<s%> <S%G1415>strong<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> we <S%G2172>wish<s%>, even <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2676>perfection<s%>. perfection: or, reformation, or, restoration

<S%G5124>Therefore<s%> <S%G1223><s%> I <S%G1125>write<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> being <S%G548>absent<s%>, <S%G3363>lest<s%> being <S%G3918>present<s%> I should <S%G5530>use<s%> <S%G664>sharpness<s%>, <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> hath <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3619>edification<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2506>destruction<s%>.

<S%G3063>Finally<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G5463>farewell<s%>. Be <S%G2675>perfect<s%>, be of good <S%G3870>comfort<s%>, be of <S%G846>one<s%> <S%G5426>mind<s%>, live in <S%G1514>peace<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>.

The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2842>communion<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%>, be <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>. The <S%G1208>second<s%> epistle <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G2881>Corinthians<s%> was <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5375>Philippi<s%>, a city of <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%>, <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G5103>Titus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3065>Lucas<s%>.
